Articles.Content:
Another interior design idea at work... the Kerbal RV. Kinda like a two-floor camper. Almost up to 400 parts... Can it be space-capable? We'll see...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

You'll need the following mods: Magic Smoke Industries Infernal Robotics, and the Glass panels mod (I think it's under GlassThings).

Craft file: http://www./download/pu25avzfwajqk18/Kerbal_RV.craft
